articles.content: Selina Smedley said she was expecting to have jobless aid through early September, a $300 weekly boost that has been helping her get by while her Dallas-area cleaning business remains far below pre-p… [+14524 chars]

articles.author: Chonce Maddox Rhea
articles.title: Considering a joint mortgage? Here’s what you need to know - Fox Business
articles.description: Joint mortgages are common, but you must keep in mind that each person must meet the qualifications for a mortgage. Here's what you need to know before getting a joint mortgage so you can weigh the pros and cons.
articles.content: If you live with someone else and are thinking about buying a home, odds are you might be looking into joint mortgages. Getting a joint mortgage with a partner or trusted friend could be beneficial b… [+5899 chars]

articles.author: Laura Agadoni
articles.title: Airbnb Loses $1 Billion: What Does It Mean for Short-Term Rentals? - Motley Fool
articles.description: Airbnb might have reported a huge loss in Q1 2021 of $1 billion, but it pays to dissect the reason. Find out what happened.
